text:
Washington Bridge, spanning the Harlem River, from upper Manhattan; at (West 181st Street and Amsterdam Ave), to the Bronx. The photographers vantage point is in the latter and he is viewing towards the former. About 1932.

Ewing Galloway.
title: Bridges - Washington Bridge [spanning the Harlem River from upper Manhattan at West 181st Street and Amsterdam Avenue to the Bronx.]

text:
Washington Bridge, spanning the Harlem River and connecting W. 181st Street, Manhattan (left), with the Bronx. The views are north from High Bridge.

June 20, 1940
Views 1,2

P. L. Sperr
title: Bridges - Washington Bridge - Harlem River - [High Bridge.]

text:
Washington Bridge, spanning the Harlem River and connecting W. 181st Street, Manhattan (left), with the Bronx. The views are north from High Bridge.

June 20, 1940
Views 1,2

P. L. Sperr
title: Bridges - Washington Bridge - Harlem River - [High Bridge.]
